mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id AS orderId, item_id AS itemId, price, quantity, created_at AS createdAt FROM order_item WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item ( order_id, item_id, price, quantity, created_at ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{itemId}, #{price}, #{quantity}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
